{{DisambigMsg|the item in {{game|poe2}}|the item in {{game|poe1}}|Kraken Eye|the inn of the same name|The Kraken's Eye}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an {{lc:Ingredient}} in {{poe2}}.

It is the only ingredient in an alternate recipe used to upgrade [Exceptional](/exceptional/) quality items to [Superb](/superb/) quality.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Use 

* Two copies of the Kraken's Eye allow upgrading any weapon, armor, or shield from [Exceptional](/exceptional/) to [Superb](/superb/) quality with no extra copper cost. This still allows you to proceed to legendary as normal.
